title: The Truth
lyrics:
No more time for saving
What the hell did you give?
What the hell did you do?
Just more numb to waste it
You will mean nothing
You will be nothing

One more tragic instant lost



Right underneath

While you dream

We stay asleep now



Why does it always seem to rain when I want to see sunshine?

How come you never want to play the game?

Why does it always seem to fade when I want to be defined?

How come you never try to say my name?



One more time for raging

What the hell did you give?

What the hell did you do?

Won't be long to hating

You will mean nothing

You will be nothing

Your last tragic instant lost



Right underneath

While you dream

We stay asleep now



Why does it always seem to rain when I want to see sunshine?

How come you never want to play the game?

Why does it always seem to fade when I want to be defined?

How come you never try to say my name?



Say my name



Lost



Right underneath

While you dream

We stay asleep



Why does it always seem to rain when I want to see sunshine?

How come you never want to play the game?

Why does it always seem to fade when I want to be defined?

How come you never try to say my name?
